alert.note: Alert for Clearwater; Idaho (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 29 at 5:31PM MDT until August 29 at 5:45PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM MDT/445 PM PDT/ FOR NORTHEASTERN IDAHO...EAST CENTRAL CLEARWATER... SOUTHEASTERN MINERAL...SOUTHWESTERN MISSOULA AND NORTHERN RAVALLI COUNTIES... At 530 PM MDT/430 PM PDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles south of Frenchtown, or 12 miles west of Missoula, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Lolo Pass and Lolo Hot Springs. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
